title: PetaPixel Members Now Get 5% Off Certified Pre-Owned Gear From KEH
description: PetaPixel is expanding its membership benefits further this week with the addition of a 5% discount on certified pre-owned camera equipment from KEH! [Read More]
author: Jaron Schneider
excerpt: PetaPixel s expanding its membership benefits further this week with the addition of a 5% discount on pre-owned camera equipment from KEH!
text: PetaPixel is expanding its membership benefits further this week with the addition of a 5% discount on certified pre-owned camera equipment from KEH! Become a PetaPixel Member Today KEH is PetaPixel‘s official pre-owned camera gear partner and the biggest supporter of Chris Niccolls and Jordan Drake’s PetaPixel YouTube show now for two straight years. As part of the ongoing partnership, PetaPixel is pleased to announce that Members can get 5% off all purchases at KEH. Members will find instructions on how to obtain the 5% off coupon by clicking on “My Account” in the website menu and then on the “special promo codes just for you” found on every Account Details page when logged in. Standard exclusions apply. There are now multiple bonuses to becoming a PetaPixel member that will immediately more than pay for the cost of membership, which is just $3 a month or $30 a year. Members get 25% off orders at the PetaPixel Merch Store, $15 off an order from the Moment store, and 5% off orders at KEH. Beyond these direct money saving benefits, Members also never see ads on PetaPixel.com when logged in and also gain access to our Sample Galleries, which provide multiple JPEG and RAW files from all of the new cameras and lenses PetaPixel reviews. Just today, new Sample Galleries for the Tamron 16-30mm f/2.8 Di III VXD G2, Rokinon x Schneider-Kreuznach 14-24mm f/2.8 (also sold under the Samyang label), and the Venus Optics Laowa 8-15mm f/2.8 FF II. Those join the galleries for the OM System OM-5 Mark II, Fujifilm X-E5, Light Lens Lab 50mm f/1.5 Z21, and the Sigma 17-40mm f/1.8 DC Art which were added last week. PetaPixel‘s Sample Galleries also include a host of the latest cameras and lenses, including the Canon R50V and V1, the Sigma 300-600mm f/4 DG OS Sports, the Fujifilm X-E5, Panasonic’s entirely new S1 and S1R series, The Fujifilm X-Half, and many more. Become a member today and download until your heart’s content! In total, there are now 30 sample galleries now available to members since we started just a few months ago and that number continues to grow. With the addition of new cost-saving benefits, the growing library of Sample Galleries, and the removal of ads from the browsing experience, there has never been a better time to become a PetaPixel Member. Become a PetaPixel Member Today PetaPixel articles may include affiliate links; if you buy something through such a link, PetaPixel may earn a commission.
html:
PetaPixel is expanding its membership benefits further this week with the addition of a 5% discount on certified pre-owned camera equipment from KEH!

Become a PetaPixel Member Today

KEH is PetaPixel‘s official pre-owned camera gear partner and the biggest supporter of Chris Niccolls and Jordan Drake’s PetaPixel YouTube show now for two straight years. As part of the ongoing partnership, PetaPixel is pleased to announce that Members can get 5% off all purchases at KEH.

Members will find instructions on how to obtain the 5% off coupon by clicking on “My Account” in the website menu and then on the “special promo codes just for you” found on every Account Details page when logged in. Standard exclusions apply.

There are now multiple bonuses to becoming a PetaPixel member that will immediately more than pay for the cost of membership, which is just $3 a month or $30 a year. Members get 25% off orders at the PetaPixel Merch Store, $15 off an order from the Moment store, and 5% off orders at KEH.

Beyond these direct money saving benefits, Members also never see ads on PetaPixel.com when logged in and also gain access to our Sample Galleries, which provide multiple JPEG and RAW files from all of the new cameras and lenses PetaPixel reviews.

Just today, new Sample Galleries for the Tamron 16-30mm f/2.8 Di III VXD G2, Rokinon x Schneider-Kreuznach 14-24mm f/2.8 (also sold under the Samyang label), and the Venus Optics Laowa 8-15mm f/2.8 FF II. Those join the galleries for the OM System OM-5 Mark II, Fujifilm X-E5, Light Lens Lab 50mm f/1.5 Z21, and the Sigma 17-40mm f/1.8 DC Art which were added last week.

PetaPixel‘s Sample Galleries also include a host of the latest cameras and lenses, including the Canon R50V and V1, the Sigma 300-600mm f/4 DG OS Sports, the Fujifilm X-E5, Panasonic’s entirely new S1 and S1R series, The Fujifilm X-Half, and many more. Become a member today and download until your heart’s content! In total, there are now 30 sample galleries now available to members since we started just a few months ago and that number continues to grow.

With the addition of new cost-saving benefits, the growing library of Sample Galleries, and the removal of ads from the browsing experience, there has never been a better time to become a PetaPixel Member.

Become a PetaPixel Member Today

PetaPixel articles may include affiliate links; if you buy something through such a link, PetaPixel may earn a commission.
